select a.STATE, a.SALE_ORDER_NO from ERP_SALE_ORDER a where a.SALE_ORDER_ID in (select b.SALE_ORDER_ID from ERP_STOREOUT_PRD_DTL b where b.STOREOUT_ID=#STOREOUT_ID# and b.DEL_FLAG=0 ) and a.DEL_FLAG=0
sqlMap.update: update ERP_SALE_ORDER a set a.STATE=#STATE# where a.SALE_ORDER_ID in (select d.SALE_ORDER_ID from ERP_STOREOUT_PRD_DTL d where d.STOREOUT_ID = #STOREOUT_ID# and d.DEL_FLAG = 0 ) and a.STATE='已发货' and a.DEL_FLAG=0

update ERP_SALE_ORDER_DTL b set b.STATE = '正常' where b.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID in (select d.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID from ERP_STOREOUT_PRD_DTL d where d.STOREOUT_ID = #STOREOUT_ID# and d.DEL_FLAG = 0
) and b.STATE = '已发货' and b.DEL_FLAG=0

update ERP_SALE_ORDER_DTL b set b.SENDED_NUM = (select (NVL(b.SENDED_NUM, 0) - NVL(d.STOREOUT_NUM, 0)) from ERP_STOREOUT_PRD_DTL d where b.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID = d.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID and d.STOREOUT_ID = #STOREOUT_ID# and d.DEL_FLAG = 0)
where exists (select 1 from ERP_STOREOUT_PRD_DTL d where b.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID = d.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID and d.STOREOUT_ID = #STOREOUT_ID# and d.DEL_FLAG = 0)

update ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL b set b.REAL_SEND_NUM = (select (NVL(b.REAL_SEND_NUM, 0) - NVL(d.STOREOUT_NUM, 0)) from ERP_STOREOUT_PRD_DTL d where b.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID = d.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID and d.STOREOUT_ID = #STOREOUT_ID# and d.DEL_FLAG = 0)
where exists (select 1 from ERP_STOREOUT_PRD_DTL d where b.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID = d.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID and d.STOREOUT_ID = #STOREOUT_ID# and d.DEL_FLAG = 0) and NVL(b.REAL_SEND_NUM,0)>0 and b.DELIVER_ORDER_ID=#DELIVER_ORDER_ID#
update DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL d set d.DEL_FLAG=1 where d.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID=( select n.STOREIN_NOTICE_ID from DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE n where n.STOREIN_NOTICE_NO=#STOREIN_NOTICE_NO# and n.DEL_FLAG=0 )
